string.text: Hey stalker, that suit of yours...I can turn that into something truly special. I have everything I need for the suit, but show me you're serious - bring me a rare artifact and I'll upgrade your suit.
One of my artifact hunters had some mildly bad luck yesterday. Climbed the Oakpine and pulled out a cache of nice artifacts, but dropped his binoculars into the pit. Poor him! Do you have any spares?
